00017 SmppNwIf::SmppNwIf() {
00018 
00019         MT_LOGINIT(SmppNwIf);
00020         m_rcvBuf = new RcvBuf();
00021         hexLogEnable = true;
00022         smppLogEnable = true;
00023         CDRlogger = LoggerFactory::instance()->createLogger("cdr_logger");
00024         active = false;
00025         deletInactive = false;
00026         hexLogger = LoggerFactory::instance()->createLogger("BinaryPDULogger");
00027         smppLogger = LoggerFactory::instance()->createLogger("SmppPDULogger");
00028         notifyInspector = true;
00029 
00030         m_maxRps = 0;
00031         m_sendTimeout = 0;

00060 int SmppNwIf::SendPdu(TCPSocket* s, Smpp::Header* h) {
00061 
00062         if (s == NULL)
00063                 s = sock;
00064         if (h == NULL)
00065                 return -1;
00066 
00067         int bytesSent = -1;
00068         uint8_t* buf = NULL;
00069         unsigned int len;
00070 
00071         Smpp::BindReceiver* brv;
00072         Smpp::BindReceiverResp* brvr;
00073         Smpp::BindTransmitter* btm;
00074         Smpp::BindTransmitterResp* btmr;
00075         Smpp::SubmitSm* sm;
00076         Smpp::SubmitSmResp* smr;
00077         Smpp::DeliverSm* dm;
00078         Smpp::DeliverSmResp* dmr;
00079         Smpp::BindTransceiverResp* btr;
00080         Smpp::BindTransceiver* btv;
00081         Smpp::EnquireLink *enq;
00082         Smpp::EnquireLinkResp *enqr;
00083         Smpp::Unbind *unb;
00084         switch (h->command_id()) {
00085         case 0x00000001:
00086 
00087                 brv = (Smpp::BindReceiver*) h;
00088                 buf = (uint8_t*) brv->encode();
00089                 len = (unsigned int) brv->command_length();
00090 
00091                 break;
00092 
00093         case 0x80000001:
00094 
00095                 brvr = (Smpp::BindReceiverResp*) h;
00096                 buf = (uint8_t*) brvr->encode();
00097                 len = (unsigned int) brvr->command_length();
00098                 break;
00099 
00100         case 0x00000002:
00101 
00102                 btm = (Smpp::BindTransmitter*) h;
00103                 buf = (uint8_t*) btm->encode();
00104                 len = (unsigned int) btm->command_length();
00105 
00106                 break;
00107 
00108         case 0x80000002:
00109 
00110                 btmr = (Smpp::BindTransmitterResp*) h;
00111                 buf = (uint8_t*) btmr->encode();
00112                 len = (unsigned int) btmr->command_length();
00113                 break;
00114 
00115         case 0x00000004:
00116 
00117                 sm = dynamic_cast<Smpp::SubmitSm*>(h);
00118                 buf = (uint8_t*) sm->encode();
00119                 len = (unsigned int) sm->command_length();
00120                 LogSm(sm, false);
00121 
00122                 break;
00123 
00124         case 0x80000004:
00125 
00126                 smr = (Smpp::SubmitSmResp*) h;
00127                 buf = (uint8_t*) smr->encode();
00128                 len = (unsigned int) smr->command_length();
00129                 LogSmResp(smr, false);
00130 
00131                 break;
00132 
00133         case 0x00000005:
00134 
00135                 dm = (Smpp::DeliverSm*) h;
00136                 buf = (uint8_t*) dm->encode();
00137                 len = (unsigned int) dm->command_length();
00138 
00139                 break;
00140 
00141         case 0x80000005:
00142 
00143                 dmr = (Smpp::DeliverSmResp*) h;
00144                 buf = (uint8_t*) dmr->encode();
00145                 len = (unsigned int) dmr->command_length();
00146                 break;
00147 
00148         case 0x80000009:
00149 
00150                 btr = (Smpp::BindTransceiverResp*) h;
00151                 buf = (uint8_t*) btr->encode();
00152                 len = (unsigned int) btr->command_length();
00153 
00154                 break;
00155 
00156         case 0x00000009:
00157 
00158                 btv = (Smpp::BindTransceiver*) h;
00159                 buf = (uint8_t*) btv->encode();
00160                 len = (unsigned int) btv->command_length();
00161 
00162                 break;
00163 
00164         case 0x00000015:
00165                 enq = (Smpp::EnquireLink*) h;
00166                 buf = (uint8_t*) enq->encode();
00167                 len = (unsigned int) enq->command_length();
00168                 break;
00169 
00170         case 0x80000015:
00171                 enqr = (Smpp::EnquireLinkResp*) h;
00172                 buf = (uint8_t*) enqr->encode();
00173                 len = (unsigned int) enqr->command_length();
00174                 break;
00175 
00176         case Smpp::CommandId::Unbind:
00177                 unb = (Smpp::Unbind*) h;
00178                 buf = (uint8_t*)unb->encode();
00179                 len = (unsigned int) unb->command_length();
00180                 break;
00181         default:
00182                 MT_LOGWARNING("has now wraper for sending comman_id (" << h->command_id() << ")")
00183                 break;
00184         }
00185 
00186         if (buf != NULL) {
00187                 bytesSent = s->Send((char*)buf, len);
00188                 if (hexLogEnable) {
00189                         LogPduHex(false, buf, len);
00190                 }
00191                 if (smppLogEnable && h != NULL) {
00192                         LogPdu(h);
00193                 }
00194 
00195         }
00196 
00197         return bytesSent;
00198 
00199 }

00201 Smpp::Header* SmppNwIf::RecvPdu(TCPSocket* s) {
00202 
00203         if (s == NULL)
00204                 s = sock;
00205 
00206         if(m_rcvBuf == NULL)
00207                 return NULL;
00208 
00209         Smpp::Header* hdr = NULL;
00210         int ret = 0;
00211 
00212         int recvedBytes = s->Recv((char*)m_rcvBuf->buf, 16);
00213         if (recvedBytes != 16) {
00214                 MT_LOGERROR("can't recv smpp pdu header. recv only  "<<recvedBytes<<" bytes");
00215                 return NULL;
00216         }
00217 
00218         unsigned int len = ntohl(m_rcvBuf->hdr.length);
00219 
00220         if(len > sizeof(RcvBuf)){
00221                 MT_LOGERROR("can't recv smpp pdu header. length is too much: "<<len)
00222                 return NULL;
00223         }
00224 
00225         do {
00226 
00227                 if (len > 16) {
00228                         ret = s->Recv((char*)(m_rcvBuf->buf + recvedBytes), len - recvedBytes);
00229                         if (ret <= 0) {
00230                                 MT_LOGERROR("can't recv smpp pdu body");
00231                                 return NULL;
00232                         }
00233                         recvedBytes += ret;
00234                 }
00235         } while ((unsigned) recvedBytes < len);
00236 
00237         if (hexLogEnable) {
00238                 LogPduHex(true, m_rcvBuf->buf, len);
00239         }
00240         Smpp::BindReceiver *brv = NULL;
00241         Smpp::BindReceiverResp *brvr = NULL;
00242         Smpp::BindTransmitterResp *btmr = NULL;
00243         Smpp::BindTransmitter *btm = NULL;
00244         Smpp::BindTransceiver *btv = NULL;
00245         Smpp::SubmitSmResp *ssr = NULL;
00246         Smpp::SubmitSm *sm = NULL;
00247         Smpp::BindTransceiverResp *btvr = NULL;
00248         Smpp::DeliverSm *ds = NULL;
00249         Smpp::DeliverSmResp *dsr = NULL;
00250         Smpp::EnquireLink *enq = NULL;
00251         Smpp::EnquireLinkResp *enqr = NULL;
00252         try {
00253                 switch (ntohl(m_rcvBuf->hdr.cmd)) {
00254 
00255                 case 0x00000001:
00256                         brv = new Smpp::BindReceiver();
00257                         brv->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00258                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) brv;
00259                         break;
00260                 case 0x80000001:
00261                         brvr = new Smpp::BindReceiverResp();
00262                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) brvr;
00263                         brvr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00264                         break;
00265 
00266                 case 0x00000002:
00267                         btm = new Smpp::BindTransmitter();
00268                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) btm;
00269                         btm->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00270                         break;
00271                 case 0x80000002:
00272                         btmr = new Smpp::BindTransmitterResp();
00273                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) btmr;
00274                         btmr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00275                         break;
00276 
00277                 case 0x00000009:
00278                         btv = new Smpp::BindTransceiver();
00279                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) btv;
00280                         btv->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00281                         break;
00282                 case 0x80000009:
00283                         btvr = new Smpp::BindTransceiverResp();
00284                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) btvr;
00285                         btvr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00286                         break;
00287                 case 0x00000004:
00288                         sm = new Smpp::SubmitSm();
00289                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) sm;
00290                         sm->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00291                         LogSm(sm, true);
00292                         break;
00293                 case 0x80000004:
00294                         ssr = new Smpp::SubmitSmResp();
00295                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) ssr;
00296                         ssr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00297                         LogSmResp(ssr, true);
00298                         break;
00299 
00300                 case 0x00000005:
00301                         ds = new Smpp::DeliverSm();
00302                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) ds;
00303                         ds->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00304                         break;
00305                 case 0x80000005:
00306                         dsr = new Smpp::DeliverSmResp();
00307                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) dsr;
00308                         dsr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00309                         break;
00310 
00311                 case 0x00000015:
00312                         enq = new Smpp::EnquireLink();
00313                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) enq;
00314                         enq->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00315                         break;
00316 
00317                 case 0x80000015:
00318                         enqr = new Smpp::EnquireLinkResp();
00319                         hdr = (Smpp::Header*) enqr;
00320                         enqr->decode((const Smpp::Uint8*) m_rcvBuf->buf);
00321                         break;
00322 
00323                 default:
00324                         MT_LOGWARNING("("<<m_systemId << ") RecvPdu: can't find wrapper for command: "<< ntohl(m_rcvBuf->hdr.cmd))
00325                 }
00326         }
00327         catch (const std::exception &e) {
00328                 MT_LOGWARNING("("<<m_systemId << ") exception in pdu parsing cmd_id: "<< ntohl(m_rcvBuf->hdr.cmd) <<". "<<e.what())
00329         }
00330 
00331         if (smppLogEnable && hdr != NULL) {
00332                 LogPdu(hdr, true);
00333         }
00334 
00335         return hdr;
00336 
00337 }
00338 
00339 void SmppNwIf::LogPduHex(bool rcv, const uint8_t* const ptr, unsigned int len) {
00340         std::string logmsg = "";
00341         char buf[64];
00342         if (rcv) {
00343                 logmsg = "RX:";
00344         } else {
00345                 logmsg = "TX:";
00346         }
00347 
00348         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00349                 if (!(i % 4))
00350                         logmsg.append(" ");
00351                 snprintf(buf, 64, "%.2x", (unsigned char) ptr[i]);
00352                 logmsg.append(buf);
00353         }
00354 
00355         hexLogger->info("%s", logmsg.c_str());
00356 }
00357 
00358 void SmppNwIf::LogSm(Smpp::SubmitSm* sm, bool rcv) {
00359 
00360         std::string logStr, logmsg;
00361         char buf[1024];
00362 
00363         if (rcv) {
00364                 logmsg = "RX:";
00365         } else {
00366                 logmsg = "TX:";
00367         }
00368 
00369         Smpp::SmeAddress addr = sm->source_addr();
00370         std::string src = addr.address();
00371 
00372         addr = sm->destination_addr();
00373         std::string dst = addr.address();
00374 
00375         snprintf(
00376                         buf,
00377                         1024,
00378                         "from %s, sn(%u), command_id(%u), status(%u), source_addr(%s), destination_addr(%s)",
00379                         m_systemId.c_str(), sm->sequence_number(), sm->command_id(),
00380                         sm->command_status(), src.c_str(), dst.c_str());
00381 
00382         logStr = buf;
00383 
00384         if (logStr.length()) {
00385                 logmsg.append(logStr);
00386                 CDRlogger->info("%s", logmsg.c_str());
00387         }
00388 }

00390 void SmppNwIf::LogSmResp(Smpp::SubmitSmResp* smr, bool rcv) {
00391         std::string logStr, logmsg;
00392         char buf[1024];
00393 
00394         if (rcv) {
00395                 logmsg = "RX:";
00396         } else {
00397                 logmsg = "TX:";
00398         }
00399 
00400         snprintf(buf, 1024, "from %s sn(%u), command_id(%u), status(%u)",
00401                         m_systemId.c_str(), smr->sequence_number(), smr->command_id(),
00402                         smr->command_status());
00403 
00404         logStr = buf;
00405 
00406         if (logStr.length()) {
00407                 logmsg.append(logStr);
00408                 CDRlogger->info("%s", logmsg.c_str());
00409         }
00410 }

00412 void SmppNwIf::LogPdu(Smpp::Header* h, bool rcv) {
00413         std::string logStr, logmsg;
00414 
00415         if (rcv) {
00416                 logmsg = "RX:";
00417         } else {
00418                 logmsg = "TX:";
00419         }
00420 
00421         if (!h->command_status()) {
00422 
00423                 switch (h->command_id()) {
00424 
00425                 case 0x80000002:
00426                         logStr
00427                                         = PduLogHelper::LogBindTvResp(
00428                                                         (Smpp::BindTransceiverResp*) h);
00429                         break;
00430                 case 0x00000002:
00431                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogBindTv((Smpp::BindTransceiver*) h);
00432                         break;
00433 
00434                 case 0x00000004:
00435                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogSubmitSm(dynamic_cast<Smpp::SubmitSm*>(h));
00436                         break;
00437                 case 0x80000004:
00438                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogSubmitSmResp((Smpp::SubmitSmResp*) h);
00439                         break;
00440                 case 0x00000005:
00441                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogDeliverSm((Smpp::DeliverSm*) h);
00442                         break;
00443                 case 0x80000005:
00444                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogDeliverSmResp((Smpp::DeliverSmResp*) h);
00445                         break;
00446 
00447                 case 0x00000006:
00448                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogUnbind((Smpp::Unbind*) h);
00449                         break;
00450 
00451                 case 0x00000015:
00452                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogEnqLink((Smpp::EnquireLink*) h);
00453                         break;
00454                 case 0x80000015:
00455                         logStr = PduLogHelper::LogEnqLinkResp((Smpp::EnquireLinkResp*) h);
00456                         break;
00457 
00458                 }
00459 
00460         }
00461 
00462 
00463         if (logStr.length()) {
00464                 logmsg.append(logStr);
00465                 smppLogger->info("%s", logmsg.c_str());
00466         }
00467 }
00468
